Enums/CaffeinationError.html#/s:11Caffei.name: caffeinateNotFound
Enums/CaffeinationError.html#/s:11Caffei.abstract: Thrown if the caffeinate executable cannot be found.

Enums/CaffeinationError.html#/s:11Caffei.name: alreadyActive
Enums/CaffeinationError.html#/s:11Caffei.abstract: Thrown if an attempt is made to start a Caffeination on an already-active instance.

Enums/SignalError.html#/s:11CaffeineKit1.name: duplicateSignalAdded
Enums/SignalError.html#/s:11CaffeineKit1.abstract: Indicates that an attempt was made to add a trap for a signal that is already being trapped.

Enums/LogLevel.html.name: LogLevel
Enums/LogLevel.html.abstract: Indicates the level of logging to be performed by CaffeineKit.

Enums/CaffeinationError.html.name: CaffeinationError
Enums/CaffeinationError.html.abstract: An error related to core CaffeineKit functionality.

Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.name: user
Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.abstract: Simulates user activity to keep display awake.

Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.name: process(_:)
Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.abstract: Terminates Caffeination when process with specified PID exits. Might be preempted by .timed.

Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.name: timed(_:)
Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.abstract: Terminates Caffeination after specified period of time in seconds. Might be preempted by .process.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: caffeinateExists
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Indicates whether the caffeinate executable is in the correct location.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: safetyEnabled
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: If true, will automatically set the caffeinate process to terminate with this application’s termination. Has no bearing on traps.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: terminationHandler
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: The function to be executed once the Caffeination terminates.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: interceptAppTermination
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Whether the Caffeination will be automatically terminated when the app is quit using the Quit menu or other Apple Event-based means.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: closure(_:)
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Generates a closure that Caffeinates for the duration of its execution. Inherits the Caffeination object’s opts, of which only .disk, .display, .idle, and .user will be honored.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: closure(withOpts:_:)
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Generates a Caffienated closure not associated with any Caffeination instance. Only the .disk, .display, .idle, and .user options will be honored.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: unsafeClosure(withOpts:_:)
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Generates a Caffienated closure not associated with any Caffeination instance. Only the .disk, .display, .idle, and .user options will be honored. Prioritizes the return of a closure and will allow the closure to run even if the caffeinate executable is not found. Manually use Caffeination.caffeinateExists to check that the intended behavior will occur.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: stop()
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Stops the Caffeination if it is active.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: addTrap(for:)
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Adds a trap to intercept signals. Useful for ensuring that the caffeinate process is terminated prior to app termination. Can only be called once per signal, and a trap cannot be removed once it has been created.
